title: Scene of the Crime: A Little Piece of Goodnight
description: Sardonic, sentimental detective Jack Herriman has moved in with his Uncle Knut, an award-winning crime-scene photographer. Hes attempting to rebuild his shattered life and career, and put his checkered past behind him. Jack takes on a missing-persons case that quickly turns into a murder investigation, dragging him into the midst of a family scandal and a lasciviousand potentially deadlyNew Age cult.
author: Ed Brubaker
